display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (NREM): Apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of NREM sleep from type II polysomnography
calculation: 60 * ( hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + canbp4 + canop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 ) / ( slpprdp - minremp )
